data.title: Unique take on pizza
data.text:
I've seen most reviews on Napoli's as being very positive and I'd agree with that too.  The one thing I've noticed about this place is they have VERY LOYAL FANS!  The first time I was introduced to this place, it was introduced as "The best pizza you will ever have in your life."  My wife's co-worker raved about Napoli's and told her how she would drive like 30 or 40 mintues just to get the pizza.  So we figured it has to be great.

I'll definitely give the pizza very positive reviews - super crunchy crust, but not overcooked.  Really gives you that perfect pizza crust crunch.  Flavorful pizza sauce and the unqiue spin is the cheese.  it's covered in grated Parmesan cheese, not shredded mozzarella or some sort of mozzarella blend.  It's simply grated Parmesan cheese which give it a unique flavor.  Definitely a bit on the salty side.  

They offer a few topping options and also have spinach and meat pies - I've only tried the traditional pizza and have been back 4 times in total.  For me - it's kind of out of my way to drive to just for pizza and I'd highly recommend calling ahead becasue they only make a certain amount of pizza each day.  once it's gone, it's gone.  

As there are many takes on pizza, it's certainly worth a visit, especially those of you who like Tripoli, Christy's, Piro's pan/square pizza.

data.title: Classic place to grab a slice!
data.text: Classic place to grab a slice! Great pizza! Been coming here for generations! Love the grated cheese!

data.title: Napoli's Pizza
data.text: This pizza is amazing we tried it first time this year and loved it. The taste is much different since it is made with with grated parm cheese. We tried both ways their regular way with grated parm cheese and the common way we are used to with shredded.mozzarella. BOTH were a yummy and we have been back a couple times but you have to go when they still have pizza left because once their dough runs out each day they close up shop for the day. Highly recommend both style pizza from here♥

data.title: big pie, great taste
data.text: Walked over and grabbed a big pie for dinner last night. The sweet sauce is really good. I havent had anything like that anywhere else. I'll definitely be back.

data.title: Napolis  Pizza Eatery
data.text: Napolis Pizza is like eating a pizza from the old days when it was cooked to perfection, not too much sauce but a lot of flavor, the crust is darker the way it should be, i would recommend Napolis to everyone that likes the taste of pizza from long ago.

data.title: great!
data.text: This is delicious pizza !  Crust is outstanding, great sauce, wonderful all the way around. Both the original( grated cheese) and the mozzarella are so tasty.  Love it!

data.title: Yuck  as far as I go but this may appeal to others
data.text: We tried the cheese pizza that was "famous" the crust was fine but not my cup of tea for the rest of it - the sauce was good but go traditional if ordering a pizza

data.title: My granddaughter said the best pizza
data.text: I believe anything that she said because she says this is the  best pizza in the city. I certainly have to rely on her opinion. So I tried it and she is right. The place is excellent and the staff are very committed to doing the best for their customers.

data.title: Great Pizza different
data.text: This is great pizza, none other like it my go to when I don't feel like cooking.  The kids love it and sometimes I will buy and freeze to bring with us up to Maine on the weekends.

data.title: Consistent excellent pizza
data.text: A favorite for many years. Pizza made fresh constantly. Price is very reasonable. Unfortunately my husband has had to use a gluten free diet so we can't buy it any more would be great if a gluten free pizza could be found here. This is carry out only.

data.title: yummy pizza
data.text: Love the pizza it's different from the average pizza the use a parmesan cheese instead of mozzarella but you still can order it with mozzarella

data.title: Pizza here is delicious.....not Greek style.....just Parmesan cheese dusted all over.
data.text: Your choice as to how much cheese goes over the top.     Pizza is as I remember getting it all my life.    Delicious and made extremely well.   Crust is great too

data.title: Strange hours
data.text: I suppose when your pizza is this good you can definitely pick and choose odd hours. I love this place.. it hasn't changed one bit since I was a kid. It's  always great.

data.title: NOSTALGIC PIZZA
data.text: Been coming to Napoli's since it was a tiny shop with the original owner in Haverhill for Decades.  Haven't been for some time and thought it was time.  I called at 6:55 pm and I asked when they closed.  The man said 7pm, but what did I want to order?  I told him I wanted 1/2 tray and he said "Okay...come now!"  Off we were running to get to the place in time.  Wonderful greeting by the man behind the counter and he couldn't have been any nicer for doing that for two people who were really craving Napoli's.  The pizza was just like we remembered!  PERFECT!  Got to get it Original Style with the "grated" cheese.  The BEST!

data.title: Delicious italian pizza
data.text: Old school italian pizza with Parmesan cheese only! This is what I grew up on so I think it's as good as I remember! Definitely worth a try for something different

data.title: Unique and most delicious pizza!
data.text: I am from NJ and always get pizza from Napoli's when I am visiting family in Haverhill. The grated cheese pizza is my ultimate favorite. I buy way more than I can eat, so I can take it home and freeze it for another time. Truly the most unique and delicious pizza I have ever had.

data.title: best pizza in Haverhill
data.text: There is nothing like this around- it is probably the closest thing to Old Forge style pizza you can find in New England.  The grated cheese is their specialty, but I recommend the mozzerella.  Both are good, though, and you will not be disappointed.

data.title: OLD FASHION PIZZA
data.text:
If you love a large rectangular cheesy slice of pizza then this is the place for you!
Made by the tray and cut into large rectangular slices with sprinkled cheese.
Salty and Yummy!!  The Sauce has that old world pizzeria flavor.
Napoli's is an experience.
There is no seating here, just pick it up and eat it where you like!
Something to note is that they are not open 7 days a week either....so check out
the hours and days so you won't be disappointed when you are having your Napoli's craving!
Recommend that everyone who hasn't tried Napoli's try it at least once!

data.title: Go Someplace Else
data.text:
I disagree with the previous reviews of others about this place.

My Fiancee has raved about this place for the 9 years we've been together. Finally, today, we stopped in and got 6 slices, including meat/spinach pies. The meat/spinach pies were flavorless, and my Fiancee claims they now give SMALLER sizes as opposed to years ago. I'm Italian, from the NY/NJ area, and I know great pizza when I get it. This place is way below par.

For MY 1st visit to Napoli's, I was UNimpressed, my Fiancee, as a longtime repeat customer, she was disapointed too, which saddened me as she's been raving about how good this place at least ONCE WAS years ago.

data.title: If you want pizza, go here.
data.text: No tables, no chairs, weird hours, a counter covered in indoor outdoor carpet, and some of the best pizza around. Been going here since I was a kid. If you want something that you can actually taste, skip the flatbread and go here. Buy half a sheet for $12 and watch it put other pizza to shame.
